messages.content: You can use your local vote to get on with the priorities we all share.
We can’t afford to go back to square one. But that’s exactly where another hung parliament would take us. So your local vote has never been more important.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing in a state of the art hospital at Addenbrookes.
More per pupil funding including £780m in SEND provision.
Investing in the A428 upgrade and the south Cambridge railway station and opposing the introduction of a City Congestion Charge.

mentions.tacticalSituation: At the last election, the Conservatives were only nine seats short of a majority. This election will be just as close – and Cambridge is one of the seats Boris Johnson needs to win.

issues.economy: Our economy is growing. 3.7 million more people are in work.
issues.education: Increasing funding for Cambridge Schools – More per pupil funding including £780m in SEND provision.
issues.government: A majority government can build on our progress and invest in the priorities we all share. Because a majority government can finally get Brexit out of the way.
issues.health: Investing in our NHS – Investing in a state of the art hospital at Addenbrookes.
issues.transport: Building a better Cambridge – Investing in the A428 upgrade and the south Cambridge railway station and opposing the introduction of a City Congestion Charge.

community.content: Locally, there’s so much we can achieve. We’ve got a plan – and we’re working to deliver it.

examples: 3.7 million more people are in work.
Locally, there’s so much we can achieve.
We took the tough decisions – and we turned the economy around.
Locally, there’s so much we can achieve. We’ve got a plan – and we’re working to deliver it.
Our economy is growing. 3.7 million more people are in work. And our priorities are starting to get the attention they deserve.
Don’t risk five long years of Jeremy Corbyn.
Imagine how that would affect you and your family. Five years of tax rises. Five years of out-of-control spending. Five years of politicians arguing about Brexit.
Don’t risk five long years of Jeremy Corbyn.
At the end of this election, we could end up with Prime Minister Jeremy Corbyn.
A hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister.
